review: Would be five Stars but can't find playback settings to keep from autoplay other than that it's all I watch
author: Cory Wilcox

review: I cancelled one of my satellite boxes since my kids only watch what is available on Amazon Prime and Netflix.
author: DeLynn McAllister

review: I THOUGHT I liked my Chromecast. My Firestick does everything my Chromecast does AND get Prime. It even has a remote and an app for my iPhone. The kids are now the owners of a used Chromecast.
author: Kari Howton

review: I was a loyal chromecast user until I met the fire tv. I received mine trough the sling tv promotion. I can certainly say that it beats chrome cast. It's so much easier to use and you don't have to be dealing with the chromecast symbol not appearing on your app. You do need an Amazon prime subscription to make the most of this product. I am now a loyal Amazon fan
author: jose

review: Everything I expected it to be!
author: Melissa Coulson

review: So far so good! Wish I would have heard about it sooner.
author: Charles Brown
